January 21, 2024

Welcome to Our Blog

We are excited to share our stories and updates with you.

By Hope Borders Team

Welcome to our new blog! Here we will share stories of impact, updates on our programs, and ways you can get involved.

At Hope Has No Borders, we believe in the power of community. Every day, we see the resilience of the families we serve and the generosity of our volunteers. This blog will be a space to highlight those moments.

Stay tuned for:

  • Success stories from our housing program
  • Volunteer spotlights
  • Urgent needs and donation drives
  • Upcoming events

Thank you for being part of our journey.

Back to Blog

A 501(c)(3) non-profit organization dedicated to providing humanitarian aid, housing, and legal support to asylum seekers in Denver.

EIN: 99-1897287
